translation: Verily, this divine illusion of Mine, composed of the three qualities, is difficult to cross over; those who take refuge in Me alone, can cross over this illusion.
commentary: 7.14 Divine divine? Hi verily? This is this? Gunamayi made of Gunas? My My? Maya illusion? difficult to cross over? Me to Me? Eve even? These who? prapadyante take refuge? Mayam illusion? Etam this? Swim cross over? They they.Commentary Maya is the Upadhi or the causal body (Karana Sarira) of Isvara. It is the material cause of this universe. It is inherent in the Lord. It is constituted of the three
